list.title: goHome
list.description: Brings back to the main screen

list.title: init
list.description: Fetches the Tarot Card Answer

list.title: initNameBirth
list.description: Initalize the name and birthday Question

list.title: module:Horoscope
list.description:
init function used to fetch horoscope.json file and set up the home page
event listener behavior. Exit code 1 if successful, 0 if not.

list.title: module:Horoscope~adjustIndexForHorroscope
list.description:
returns the index corresponding to the sign in the horoscope.JSON
                 file based on the input user birthday, using the hardcoded
                 date values.

list.title: module:Horoscope~concentricGradient
list.description: Slowly fades in closer and closer

list.title: module:Horoscope~goHome
list.description: changes the location of the window to the home page

list.title: module:Horoscope~outputHoroscope
list.description: Based on the input name and birthday, a horoscope reading will be outputted to the user

list.title: module:Horoscope~pulseRedOverlay
list.description: Pulses the overlay div. This is supposed to be a blood screen

list.title: module:Horoscope~shake
list.description: Shake Element shakes the body by translating X and rotating

list.title: module:Horoscope~timer
list.description: Timer Event -> ! This function Triggers ALL TIME BASED EVENTS

list.title: parseNumbers
list.description: Parses input of all numbers

list.title: Questionaire
list.description: Init function. Currently only starts up templates

list.title: revealCard
list.description: Reveals the card

list.title: showContent
list.description:
Goes through all the questions in the questionnaire, displaying the questions one after another
based on when the user clicks the continue button.

list.title: Tarot Card Form.parseNumbers
list.description: Parses our numbers from name input

list.title: TransitionCanvas
list.description: An extension of the canvas with extra functionality for transitions between pages.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#attributeChangedCallback
list.description:
If the sfx attribute were to be changed viaa script, this lifecycle callback
will change the sfx of the audio element linked to this transition-canvas.
Convenient for development using this canvas.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#connectedCallback
list.description:
Upon connection, check the duration of the transition, an important parameter for the animations.
Also, add an optional sound effect upon transition (WIP).

list.title: TransitionCanvas#fadeIn
list.description: Animation for fading from black to the full scene

list.title: TransitionCanvas#playAnim
list.description: generic animation player.

list.title: TransitionCanvas#transitionIn
list.description:
Initiates the transition in animation. This plays immediately upon the canvas being connected
to the DOM.

list.title: window.onbeforeunload
list.description: On Exit Function -> Stores user data into local storage for further use

list.title: {Tarot Card Form}.initQuesetions
list.description:
This function initializes the variables used to store the user
answers to the name and reading category questions in the Tarot form page
